Verses: 1 yOnaavukku idhu migavum visanamaayirundhadhu�; avan kadunkObankoNdu,

2 karththarai nOkki viNNappampaNNi: aa karththaavE, naan en dhEsaththil irukkumpOdhE naan idhai sollavillaiyaa? idhinimiththamE naan munnamE tharsheesukku OdippOnEn; neer irakkamum mana urukkamum neediyasaandhamum migundha kirubaiyumuLLavarum, theengukku manaSthaabappadugiRavarumaana dhEvanendru aRivEn.
3 ippOdhum karththaavE, en praaNanai ennaivittu eduththukkoLLum; naan uyirOdirukkiRadhaippaarkkilum saagiRadhu nalamaayirukkum endraan.
4 adhaRkuk karththar: nee erichchalaayirukkiRadhu nalladhO endraar.

5 pinbu yOnaa nagaraththilirundhu puRappattu, nagaraththukkuk kizhakkEpOi angE thanakku oru kudisaiyaip pOttu, nagaraththukku sambavikkappOgiRadhaith thaan paarkkumattum adhin keezh nizhalil utkaarndhirundhaan.

6 yOnaavudaiya thalaiyinmEl nizhaluNdaayirukkavum, avanai avanudaiya manamadivukku neengalaakkavum dhEvanaagiya karththar oru aamaNakkuchchediyai muLaikkak kattaLaiyittu, adhai avanmEl OngivaLarappaNNinaar; andha aamaNakkinmEl yOnaa migavum sandhOshappattaan�.
7 maRunaaLilO kizhakkuveLukkum nEraththil dhEvan oru poochchiyaik kattaLaiyittaar; adhu aamaNakkuchchediyai ariththuppOttadhu; adhinaal adhu kaaindhupOyitru.

8 sooriyan udhiththapOdhu dhEvan ushNamaana keezhkkaatraik kattaLaiyittaar; appozhudhu veyil yOnaavudaiya thalaiyil padugiRadhinaal avan sOrndhupOi, thanakkuLLE saavai virumbi: naan uyirOdirukkiRadhaip paarkkilum saagiRadhu nalamaayirukkum endraan.
9 appozhudhu dhEvan yOnaavai nOkki: nee aamaNakkinimiththam erichchalaayirukkiRadhu nalladhO endraar; adhaRku avan: naan maraNapariyandhamum erichchalaayirukkiRadhu nalladhudhaan endraan.
10 adhaRkuk karththar: nee prayaasappadaadhadhum, nee vaLarkkaadhadhum, oru raaththiriyilE muLaiththadhum, oru raaththiriyilE azhindhupOnadhumaana aamaNakkukkaagap paridhabikkiRaayE.

11 valadhukaikkum idadhukaikkum viththiyaasam aRiyaadha latchaththu irubadhinaayirampErukku adhigamaana manusharum anEga mirugajeevangaLum irukkiRa magaa nagaramaagiya ninivEkkaaga naan paridhabiyaamaliruppEnO endraar.
